alert.note: Alert for City of Hampton; City of Newport News; City of Poquoson; York (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 02 at 8:04PM EDT until June 02 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... The City of Poquoson in southeastern Virginia... Southeastern York County in southeastern Virginia... The City of Hampton in southeastern Virginia... The southern City of Newport News in southeastern Virginia... * Until 830 PM EDT. * At 804 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Langley AFB, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Grand View around 810 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Dare, Messick, Fox Hill, Langley View and Plum Tree Island Refuge. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.

area.areaDesc: City of Hampton; City of Newport News; City of Poquoson; York
